You ask the motive."/pause 800/showFrame Charlie 26/pause 800/speak Charlie "I think that you don't know but...$7#$b# Sandy is my half-sister.$7"/pause 800/emote farmer 16/pause 800/speak Charlie "You know why I live here in Pelican Town, and not with her?$s#$b# Our family is falling apart. My dad is gone since we where kids, no one knows where he is.$7#$b# So my mother weren't having the engouth money to sustent both of us, so I came here to live with Gunther, I consider him as my dad, since he was the person that took care of me.$7#$b# And Sandy stayed with her.$7#$b# Since then, we have lost contact, so I don't know where she lives now.$s"/pause 1000/emote farmer 60/pause 800/question fork1 "You have two choices, which one?#Bring Sandy here#Take Charlie to Sandy#"/fork Takehim/pause 800/emote farmer 16/pause 800/message "You say to Charlie wait here"/pause 800/speak Charlie "Ok so...$7"/pause 800/move farmer 6 0 0/move farmer 0 -4 0/warp farmer -1000 -1000/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/pause 800/speak Charlie "What I'm going to do...$7"/changeLocation SandyHouse/warp farmer -1000 -1000 0/warp Sandy 2 5/viewport 4 6/pause 800/speak Sandy "All right, let's start cleaning!"/pause 500/move Sandy -1 0 0/textAboveHead Sandy "Sand everywhere..."/pause 3000/move Sandy 1 0 0/pause 800/warp farmer 4 9/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -2 0 0 true/faceDirection Sandy 2/pause 800/speak Sandy "Oh! Hello @.#$b# What bring you here today?"/pause 800/emote farmer 60/pause 800/message "You explain everything about Charlie."/pause 800/emote Sandy 60/pause 800/speak Sandy "Oh...$2#$b# Him...$2#$b# You know...$2#$b# We don't talk that much anymore.$2#$b# I don't know if he want to see me again.$2"/pause 800/message "You insist"/pause 1000/textAboveHead Sandy "Ok so..."/pause 3000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 800/speak Sandy "I hope this isn't a waste of time @...$2"/pause 1000/changeLocation Beach/warp Charlie 30 5/warp farmer -1000 -100/warp Sandy -1000 -1000/faceDirection Charlie 1/viewport 35 7/pause 800/emote Charlie 28/pause 800/speak Charlie "@ is taking too long...$7"/pause 800/warp farmer 38 1/move farmer 0 4 3/warp Sandy 38 1/move farmer -6 0 3 true/speak Charlie "Finally @!$7#$b# Where yoe were this hole time?$a"/pause 800/message "You say to him stay calm. Because you want to show someone"/pause 800/emote Charlie 40/pause 800/move farmer 0 2 0/move Sandy 0 4 3/move Sandy -6 0 3 true/emote Charlie 16/speak Charlie "S-Sandy...?$8"/pause 800/speak Sandy "Charlie...#$b# About time, isn't?"/pause 800/emote Charlie 20/emote Sandy 20/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/speak Charlie "Thank you @...$l"/message "I think that these two need a time alone."/mail Sandyisback/end
Entries.Takehim: pause 1000/message "You say to Charlie that you know where Sandy is."/pause 800/faceDirection Charlie 1/pause 800/emote Charlie 16/pause 800/speak Charlie "Really @?$8#$b# Take me there! Please!$8"/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/pause 1000/changeLocation SandyHouse/viewport 4 6/warp Sandy 2 5 0/faceDirection Sandy 2/warp farmer -100 -100/warp Charlie -1000 -1000/pause 1000/warp farmer 4 9 0/playSound doorClose/pause 800/move farmer 0 -2 0/move farmer -2 0 0 true/speak Sandy "Hello @.#$b#What are you going to buy today?"/pause 800/message "You say to Sandy that someone is here to see her"/pause 800/speak Sandy "Well, tell to this person come inside!"/pause 800/warp Charlie 4 9 0/playSound doorClose/pause 800/emote Sandy 16/speak Sandy "Charlie..."/pause 800/speak Charlie "Sandy...$8"/pause 800/move Charlie 0 -4 0/faceDirection Sandy 1/faceDirection Charlie 3/pause 800/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "Sandy and Charlie now are talking, better I let them there."/speak Charlie "Thank you @...$l"/mail Charlieisback/end
